text: The 2000–01 Croatian Football Cup was the tenth edition of Croatia's football knockout competition. Hajduk Split were the defending champions, and it was won by Dinamo Zagreb. ==Calendar== {| class="wikitable" style="text- align:center" ! Round !! Main date !!
